trans-unit.source: An overview of Apache Spark in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: An overview of Apache Spark in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: An introduction to Apache Spark in HDInsight and scenarios in which to use Spark on HDInsight in your applications.
trans-unit.target: An introduction to Apache Spark in HDInsight and scenarios in which to use Spark on HDInsight in your applications.

trans-unit.source: Overview: Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Overview: Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Apache Spark is an open-source parallel processing framework that supports in-memory processing to boost the performance of big-data analytic applications.
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark is an open-source parallel processing framework that supports in-memory processing to boost the performance of big-data analytic applications.

trans-unit.source: Spark processing engine is built for speed, ease of use, and sophisticated analytics.
trans-unit.target: Spark processing engine is built for speed, ease of use, and sophisticated analytics.

trans-unit.source: Spark's in-memory computation capabilities make it a good choice for iterative algorithms in machine learning and graph computations.
trans-unit.target: Spark's in-memory computation capabilities make it a good choice for iterative algorithms in machine learning and graph computations.

trans-unit.source: Spark is also compatible with Azure Blob storage (WASB) so your existing data stored in Azure can easily be processed via Spark.
trans-unit.target: Spark is also compatible with Azure Blob storage (WASB) so your existing data stored in Azure can easily be processed via Spark.

trans-unit.source: When you provision a Spark cluster in HDInsight, you provision Azure compute resources with Spark installed and configured.
trans-unit.target: When you provision a Spark cluster in HDInsight, you provision Azure compute resources with Spark installed and configured.

trans-unit.source: It only takes about ten minutes to provision a Spark cluster in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: It only takes about ten minutes to provision a Spark cluster in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: The data to be processed is stored in Azure Blob storage.
trans-unit.target: The data to be processed is stored in Azure Blob storage.

trans-unit.source: See [Use Azure Blob Storage with HDInsight][hdinsight-storage].
trans-unit.target: See [Use Azure Blob Storage with HDInsight][hdinsight-storage].

trans-unit.source: Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight

trans-unit.source: **Want to get started with Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight?** See [QuickStart: Provision a Spark cluster on HDInsight and run sample applications using Jupyter and Zeppelin](hdinsight-apache-spark-zeppelin-notebook-jupyter-spark-sql.md).
trans-unit.target: **Want to get started with Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight?** See [QuickStart: Provision a Spark cluster on HDInsight and run sample applications using Jupyter and Zeppelin](hdinsight-apache-spark-zeppelin-notebook-jupyter-spark-sql.md).

trans-unit.source: Watch a quick overview video describing Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Watch a quick overview video describing Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Why use Spark on Azure HDInsight?
trans-unit.target: Why use Spark on Azure HDInsight?

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight offers a fully managed Spark service.
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight offers a fully managed Spark service.

trans-unit.source: Benefits of using Spark on HDInsight are:
trans-unit.target: Benefits of using Spark on HDInsight are:

trans-unit.source: Feature
trans-unit.target: Feature

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Ease of provisioning
trans-unit.target: Ease of provisioning

trans-unit.source: You can provision a new Spark cluster on HDInsight in minutes using the Azure Management Portal, Azure PowerShell, or the HDInsight .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: You can provision a new Spark cluster on HDInsight in minutes using the Azure Management Portal, Azure PowerShell, or the HDInsight .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: See [Provision a Spark cluster in HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-provision-clusters.md)
trans-unit.target: See [Provision a Spark cluster in HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-provision-clusters.md)

trans-unit.source: Ease of use
trans-unit.target: Ease of use

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight clusters includes Zeppelin and Jupyter notebooks pre-configured.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight clusters includes Zeppelin and Jupyter notebooks pre-configured.

trans-unit.source: You can use these for interactive data processing and visualization.
trans-unit.target: You can use these for interactive data processing and visualization.

trans-unit.source: You can launch these notebooks from the cluster dashboard to work directly against a Spark cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can launch these notebooks from the cluster dashboard to work directly against a Spark cluster.

trans-unit.source: REST APIs
trans-unit.target: REST APIs

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight includes Spark job server, which is a REST API server that enables users to remotely submit and monitor running jobs.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight includes Spark job server, which is a REST API server that enables users to remotely submit and monitor running jobs.

trans-unit.source: Concurrent Queries
trans-unit.target: Concurrent Queries

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight supports concurrent queries.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight supports concurrent queries.

trans-unit.source: This enables multiple queries from one user or multiple queries from various users and applications to share the same cluster resources.
trans-unit.target: This enables multiple queries from one user or multiple queries from various users and applications to share the same cluster resources.

trans-unit.source: Caching on SSDs
trans-unit.target: Caching on SSDs

trans-unit.source: You can choose to cache data either in memory or in SSDs attached to the cluster nodes.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to cache data either in memory or in SSDs attached to the cluster nodes.

trans-unit.source: Caching in memory provides the best query performance but could be expensive; caching in SSDs provides a great option for improving query performance without the need to create a cluster of a size that is required to fit the entire dataset in memory.
trans-unit.target: Caching in memory provides the best query performance but could be expensive; caching in SSDs provides a great option for improving query performance without the need to create a cluster of a size that is required to fit the entire dataset in memory.

trans-unit.source: Integration with Azure services
trans-unit.target: Integration with Azure services

trans-unit.source: Spark on HDInsight comes with a connector to Azure Event Hubs.
trans-unit.target: Spark on HDInsight comes with a connector to Azure Event Hubs.

trans-unit.source: Customers can build streaming applications using the Event Hubs, in addition to [Kafka](http://kafka.apache.org/), which is already available as part of Spark.
trans-unit.target: Customers can build streaming applications using the Event Hubs, in addition to [Kafka](http://kafka.apache.org/), which is already available as part of Spark.

trans-unit.source: Integration with BI Tools
trans-unit.target: Integration with BI Tools

trans-unit.source: Spark for HDInsight provides connectors for popular BI tools such as [Power BI](http://www.powerbi.com/) and [Tableau](http://www.tableau.com/products/desktop) for data analytics.
trans-unit.target: Spark for HDInsight provides connectors for popular BI tools such as [Power BI](http://www.powerbi.com/) and [Tableau](http://www.tableau.com/products/desktop) for data analytics.

trans-unit.source: Pre-loaded Anaconda libraries
trans-unit.target: Pre-loaded Anaconda libraries

trans-unit.source: Spark clusters on HDInsight come with Anaconda libraries pre-installed.
trans-unit.target: Spark clusters on HDInsight come with Anaconda libraries pre-installed.

trans-unit.source: [Anaconda](http://docs.continuum.io/anaconda/) provides close to 200 libraries for machine learning, data analysis, visualization, etc.
trans-unit.target: [Anaconda](http://docs.continuum.io/anaconda/) provides close to 200 libraries for machine learning, data analysis, visualization, etc.

trans-unit.source: Scalability
trans-unit.target: Scalability

trans-unit.source: Although you can specify the number of nodes in your cluster during creation, you may want to grow or shrink the cluster to match workload.
trans-unit.target: Although you can specify the number of nodes in your cluster during creation, you may want to grow or shrink the cluster to match workload.

trans-unit.source: All HDInsight clusters allow you to change the number of nodes in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: All HDInsight clusters allow you to change the number of nodes in the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Also, Spark clusters can be dropped with no loss of data since all the data is stored in Azure Blob Storage.
trans-unit.target: Also, Spark clusters can be dropped with no loss of data since all the data is stored in Azure Blob Storage.

trans-unit.source: 24/7 Support
trans-unit.target: 24/7 Support

trans-unit.source: Spark on HDInsight comes with enterprise-level 24/7 support and an SLA of 99.9% up-time.
trans-unit.target: Spark on HDInsight comes with enterprise-level 24/7 support and an SLA of 99.9% up-time.

trans-unit.source: What are the use cases for Spark on HDInsight?
trans-unit.target: What are the use cases for Spark on HDInsight?

trans-unit.source: Apache Spark in HDInsight enables the following key scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark in HDInsight enables the following key scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Interactive data analysis and BI
trans-unit.target: Interactive data analysis and BI

trans-unit.source: Look at a tutorial
trans-unit.target: Look at a tutorial

trans-unit.source: Apache Spark in HDInsight stores data in Azure Blobs.
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark in HDInsight stores data in Azure Blobs.

trans-unit.source: Business experts and key decision makers can analyze and build reports over that data and use Microsoft Power BI to build interactive reports from the analyzed data.
trans-unit.target: Business experts and key decision makers can analyze and build reports over that data and use Microsoft Power BI to build interactive reports from the analyzed data.

trans-unit.source: Analysts can start from unstructured/semi structured data in Azure storage, define a schema for the data using notebooks and then build data models using Microsoft Power BI.
trans-unit.target: Analysts can start from unstructured/semi structured data in Azure storage, define a schema for the data using notebooks and then build data models using Microsoft Power BI.

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight also supports a number of third party BI tools such as Tableau, Qlikview, and SAP Lumira making it an ideal platform for data analysts, business experts, and key decision makers.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight also supports a number of third party BI tools such as Tableau, Qlikview, and SAP Lumira making it an ideal platform for data analysts, business experts, and key decision makers.

trans-unit.source: Iterative Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Iterative Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Look at a tutorial
trans-unit.target: Look at a tutorial

trans-unit.source: Apache Spark comes with [MLlib](http://spark.apache.org/mllib/), a machine learning library built on top of Spark.
trans-unit.target: Apache Spark comes with [MLlib](http://spark.apache.org/mllib/), a machine learning library built on top of Spark.

trans-unit.source: In addition to this, Spark on HDInsight also includes Anaconda, a Python distribution with a variety of packages for machine learning.
trans-unit.target: In addition to this, Spark on HDInsight also includes Anaconda, a Python distribution with a variety of packages for machine learning.

trans-unit.source: Couple this with a built-in support for Jupyter notebooks, and you have a top-of-the-line environment for creating machine learning applications.
trans-unit.target: Couple this with a built-in support for Jupyter notebooks, and you have a top-of-the-line environment for creating machine learning applications.

trans-unit.source: Streaming and real-time data analysis
trans-unit.target: Streaming and real-time data analysis

trans-unit.source: Look at a tutorial
trans-unit.target: Look at a tutorial

trans-unit.source: Real-time data analysis is used for scenarios ranging from reducing time to data insight by processing data as it lands, to building a true streaming solution.
trans-unit.target: Real-time data analysis is used for scenarios ranging from reducing time to data insight by processing data as it lands, to building a true streaming solution.

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight offers a rich support for building real-time analytics solutions.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight offers a rich support for building real-time analytics solutions.

trans-unit.source: While Spark already has connectors to ingest data from many sources like Kafka, Flume, Twitter, ZeroMQ, or TCP sockets, Spark in HDInsight adds first-class support for ingesting data from Azure Event Hubs.
trans-unit.target: While Spark already has connectors to ingest data from many sources like Kafka, Flume, Twitter, ZeroMQ, or TCP sockets, Spark in HDInsight adds first-class support for ingesting data from Azure Event Hubs.

trans-unit.source: Event Hubs are the most widely used queuing service on Azure.
trans-unit.target: Event Hubs are the most widely used queuing service on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Having an out-of-the-box support for Event Hubs makes Spark in HDInsight an ideal platform for building real time analytics pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Having an out-of-the-box support for Event Hubs makes Spark in HDInsight an ideal platform for building real time analytics pipeline.

trans-unit.source: What components are included as part of a Spark cluster?
trans-unit.target: What components are included as part of a Spark cluster?

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight includes the following components that are available on the clusters by default.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight includes the following components that are available on the clusters by default.

trans-unit.source: [Spark 1.3.1](https://spark.apache.org/docs/1.3.1/).
trans-unit.target: [Spark 1.3.1](https://spark.apache.org/docs/1.3.1/).

trans-unit.source: Comes with Spark Core, Spark SQL, Spark streaming APIs, GraphX, and MLlib.
trans-unit.target: Comes with Spark Core, Spark SQL, Spark streaming APIs, GraphX, and MLlib.

trans-unit.source: Anaconda
trans-unit.target: Anaconda

trans-unit.source: Spark Job Server
trans-unit.target: Spark Job Server

trans-unit.source: Zeppelin Notebook
trans-unit.target: Zeppelin Notebook

trans-unit.source: Jupyter Notebook
trans-unit.target: Jupyter Notebook

trans-unit.source: Spark in HDInsight also provides an [ODBC driver](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=616229) for connectivity to Spark clusters in HDInsight from BI tools such as Microsoft Power BI and Tableau.
trans-unit.target: Spark in HDInsight also provides an [ODBC driver](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=616229) for connectivity to Spark clusters in HDInsight from BI tools such as Microsoft Power BI and Tableau.
